description.value:
For effects targeting creatures by type, plantlike creatures count as both their type and plants, whichever is most detrimental to them. They also receive a +2 racial bonus to saving throws against @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Mind-affecting effects}, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralysis}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poison}, polymorph, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Sleep}, and @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunning}, unless the effect specifies that it works against plants.

Format: Other Abilities plantlike.
